main event: Three red lights in a triangular formation were observed traveling at high speed and disappearing behind trees.
interesting points: The lights were described as bright and white in color.
The objects were in a triangular formation.
The speed of the objects was faster than normal jet aircraft.
Anomalous propagation was noted on one radar system, but not on another.
The possibility exists that the objects were actually F-101 and B-66 aircraft from Shaw AFB operating in the area at the time.
sighted object: Three red lights in a triangular formation
witnesses: Civilian observers, including [REDACTED] and three other people
